DataElement.preferredName: Adverse Event Outcome Performed Observation Outcome Code Change Text ISO21090.ST.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An assessment result of the final state in a person who experienced an adverse event, which takes place after the adverse event occurs. EXAMPLE(S): Recovered/Resolved, Recovering/Resolving, Not Recovered/Not Resolved, Recovered/Resolved with Sequelae, Fatal, Unknown A character string that is a revision of the original text observation result to enable the coding of the text. EXAMPLE(S): If the originalText is "hedache", the resultCodeModifiedText could be changed to "headache", so that the text can be successfully coded.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Adverse Event Outcome Performed Observation Outcome Code Change Text
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:The result of an action.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Adverse Event Outcome Performed Observation Outcome
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any unfavorable or unintended symptom, sign, or disease including an abnormal laboratory finding) temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure.  Such events can be intervention related, dose related, route related, patient related, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).:The result of an action.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Any unfavorable or unintended disease, sign, or symptom (including an abnormal laboratory finding) that is temporally associated with the use of a medical treatment or procedure, and that may or may not be considered related to the medical treatment or procedure. Such events can be related to the intervention, dose, route of administration, patient, or caused by an interaction with another drug(s) or procedure(s).
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is given an arbitrary meaning within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The words of something written.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
